scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, depicted in profile facing left, wears a crown and a richly patterned robe. His right hand is raised in a gesture of speaking or blessing. He is framed by decorative architectural elements, including what appear to be stylized arches and foliage, set against a background of stippling. The overall impression is of a regal or significant figure within a decorative, possibly architectural, context.
